title: Shadow's Secret
description: Trapped behind the iron fence of an orphanage in Victorian England, Phillip and the other orphans can only dream of freedom. Then, a door of escape opens, and his unhappy life transforms into a glorious dream. With a new start, he rejoices in the refuge he has found and feels sure that he will never have to face the sorrows of his past again. But, can this dream heâ€™s living be real? Or will it fade away like all dreams do? When one, long-kept secret comes to light, he finds himself thrown into an adventure as unexpected as it is perilous.
author: Theresa Stinnett
